headline: The Equal Rights Amendment Isn’t the Answer
abstract: There are better ways to help women, that are less prone to generating backlash.
lead_paragraph: A growing excitement surrounds Virginia’s vote this week to ratify the Equal Rights Amendment, guaranteeing equal legal rights for all United States citizens regardless of sex. Virginia is the 38th state to ratify the E.R.A., pushing the country over the three-quarters threshold required for a constitutional amendment — assuming that the decisions of five states to rescind their ratification over the years don’t count.
